short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides ability to open pages and links by other browsers based on pre-defined rules for ThinBridge.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the development version of the "IE View WE" addon ported to Chrome.

This is provided for testing use, because we cannot call webRequestBlocking API on Manifest V3 addon while development even if it is designed for enterprise use (see also: https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1338871 ). Not recommended for regular use.

# How to use

This extension depends on a native messaging host ThinBridge, and you need to install this extension via GPO instead of installation from this website.
See detailed instructions at https://github.com/clear-code/ieview-we?tab=readme-ov-file#for-google-chrome-ie-view-we-mv3
